articles.title: Buy Tata Power Company; target of Rs 260: Sharekhan - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Sharekhan is bullish on Tata Power Company has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 260 in its research report dated October 28, 2022.
articles.content:
